author: Al Jazeera
title: Trump to ease US lockdown; says coronavirus cases 'passed peak'
description: US president says latest data has 'put us in a very strong position' to reopen parts of the country.
content:
President Donald Trump has promised to unveil plans on Thursday to reopen the world's largest economy following cautious moves in Europe, claiming the United States "passed the peak" of coronavirus cases.
The US logged a record number of deaths on Wednesday … [+6958 chars]
